snippet.title: Cubed and Dangerous | Indie Game Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Cubed and Dangerous is a charming stylized twin-stick shooter that seamlessly merges action roguelike mechanics and action RPG mechanics into an exciting run-based experience.

Release Date: Q3 2024
Demo: Very very soon

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2870580?utm_source=YT
More info: https://cubedanddangerous.com/
Press info: https://cubedanddangerous.com/press.html

*Licensed Content Disclaimer: We love and encourage anyone who wants to further share any of our content to do so, but we do have some licensing requirements due to media used in our productions. Please contact us first so we can be sure to pre-clear any content creation, it would also be great to hear more about what you're creating and see if we can help out in any way.

This licensing restriction applies mainly to our marketing materials like: Trailers, teasers, featurettes, etc.  Does not apply to raw gameplay footage captured from our game demos and releases.

Important: Gameplay from the Demo, Delivered via Press Kits, or Full Game Release  will remain completely unrestricted for content creation.
